recommendations.title: Build Emergency Fund to Prevent Further Debt Accumulation
recommendations.description: Given the high total debt and average interest rate, it's essential to create an emergency fund to prevent further debt accumulation. This will also provide a cushion for unexpected expenses and allow for more efficient debt repayment.

recommendations.title: Optimize HDFC Credit Card Payment Frequency for Credit Card Debt
recommendations.description: Given the high interest rate and balance of the HDFC Credit Card, optimizing the payment frequency can help accelerate debt repayment and avoid further debt accumulation.

recommendations.title: Prioritize Debt Consolidation for Education Loan
recommendations.description: Given the large balance and high interest rate of the MBA Education Loan, prioritizing debt consolidation can help simplify debt repayment and reduce interest expenses.
